snippet: David Ensor, who as director of the Voice of America presided over significant audience growth despite budget cuts, did not explain his decision to quit.
abstract: David Ensor says he is stepping down as head of government-funded news agency Voice of America after four years during which he fostered significant growth there; Ensor has offered no reason for resignation.
lead_paragraph: David Ensor, who as director of the Voice of America presided over significant audience growth despite budget cuts, did not explain his decision to quit.

headline.main: Director of Voice of America Is Planning to Step Down
headline.print_headline: Director of V.O.A. Is Planning to Step Down
